item.title: ‘Exit 8’ Review: A Lost Man Wanders a Labyrinthine Limbo in a Witty, Elegantly Spare Videogame Adaptation
item.description: Given how few first-person videogames make a successful transition to the big screen, it’s surprising how easy Genki Kawamura’s “Exit 8” makes it look. But perhaps the key to n
